articles.author: HOWARD FENDRICH
articles.title: Taylor Fritz beats Frances Tiafoe to become the first American man in a US Open final since 2006 - The Associated Press
articles.description: Taylor Fritz has defeated a fading Frances Tiafoe 4-6, 7-5, 4-6, 6-4, 6-1 in an all-American matchup at the U.S. Open to reach his first Grand Slam final. The 12th-seeded Fritz's victory Friday night earned him a showdown against No. 1 Jannik Sinner for the c…
articles.content: NEW YORK (AP) When Taylor Fritz, a 26-year-old from California, and Frances Tiafoe, a 26-year-old from Maryland, strode under the Arthur Ashe Stadium lights Friday night for the first U.S. Open semif… [+4991 chars]

articles.author: CHRISTOPHER RUGABER
articles.title: Sluggish US jobs report clears the way for Federal Reserve to cut interest rates - The Associated Press
articles.description: Hiring by America’s employers picked up a bit in August from July’s tepid pace, and the unemployment rate dipped for the first time since March in a sign that the job market may be cooling but remains sturdy. Employers added a modest 142,000 jobs, up from a s…
articles.content: WASHINGTON (AP) Hiring by Americas employers picked up a bit in August from Julys tepid pace, and the unemployment rate dipped for the first time since March in a sign that the job market may be cool… [+6615 chars]
